Class HandImpl<C>

java.lang.Object
HandImpl<C>
Type Parameters:
C - the type of elements in the hand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Hand<C>
public class HandImpl<C> extends Object implements Hand<C>
Implementation of the Hand interface using an ArrayList.
